hgeGUIButton::SetMode

Changes the button's behaviour mode. 

void SetMode(
  bool bTrigger
);

Parameters

bTrigger
If true, the button will operate in "trigger mode", i.e. it will change it's state with each mouse click. If false, the button will behave like usual buttons.

Requirements

Header: hgeguictrls.h
Import library: hgehelp.lib
